abstract: For those contending that the economic recovery has merely hit some bumps on the way to renewed growth, the auto industry may offer evidence.
snippet: For those contending that the economic recovery has merely hit some bumps on the way to renewed growth, the auto industry may offer evidence.
lead_paragraph: For those who believe that the economic recovery has merely hit some bumps, and that growth will accelerate during the second half of the year, the automobile industry may offer the most persuasive evidence.

headline.main: Cars as a Harbinger of an Upturn
